certifications.title: Introduction to Data Analysis using Microsoft Excel

projects.name: Road2Skill
projects.description: Designed a full-stack web application providing students with personalized career roadmaps, including frontend, backend and secure authentication implementation. Created RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, integrated MongoDB for data storage, and carried out user authentication using Passport.js. Improved accessibility to personalized career resources, increasing user engagement and providing a clear path to career success achieving a 25% increase in student satisfaction.

projects.name: E-Commerce Sales Insights Analysis By POWER BI
projects.description: This project harnesses Power BI's capabilities to empower stakeholders with a dynamic platform for sales data analysis. The derived insights lead to informed decisions and refined sales strategies which will be very useful for analysis.

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: Developed an interactive web-based sorting visualizer to demonstrate the functionality and efficiency of various sorting algorithms, including Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, and Heap Sort. Animates the step-by-step process of each algorithm, allowing users to observe how data is sorted and enables users to compare the performance of different algorithms by visualizing their execution time and number of comparisons/swaps.
keywords: Sorting concepts of Data Structures and Algorithm

experiences.description: Research Topic: Dynamic path planning and computation offloading in Wireless Powered UAV-IoT Network. Efficient Energy Transfer: Implemented methods for targeted wireless charging to IoT nodes, improving network efficiency. Advanced Research Contribution: Expanded understanding of Wireless Powered UAV-IoT Networks through innovative solutions in path planning and energy management.
Completed the given task based on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

skills: Data Visualization( using Tableau, Power BI )
